title: Nadya's Nights: Road to Vengeance
description: Things move pretty fast in Nadya Valentina’s world. Staying one step ahead isn’t just a good idea; it’s the only way to stay alive. When one of her employer’s crews is brutally slaughtered, Nadya is tasked with finding who’s responsible and enacting some payback. But the road to vengeance is a twisted one as Nadya finds her job growing increasingly complicated. She’ll have to fight her way through heavily armed goons, a pack of werewolves, and one sadistic vampire if she wants to see another sunrise. Step into Nadya's world. And get ready to run.
author: Indy McDaniel
